title: Miner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose another player to Tunnel under. All their visitors will be roleblocked. You cannot build Tunnels under the houses of players who you've already built Tunnels under.
- At night, choose two players whose houses have Tunnels. Redirect all visitors from one house to another.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and control immune
- If other Miners create Tunnels, you cannot use their Tunnels as your own.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may build a Tunnel under your house, roleblocking all visitors. 1 use.

desc:
Post 4696
*It's awful down there, but I can't stop going back.*
